file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 21-20-04-04 - CONFIG-2 - AIR CONDITIONING DUCTS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL AIR CONDITIONING DUCTS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install a typical duct. B. These procedures are not applicable to the removal/installation of a specific duct. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ACFT MODEL(S) 21-20-04-000-802-A TYPICAL DUCT - REMOVAL EMB-135 ACFT MODEL(S) 21-20-04-400-802-A TYPICAL DUCT - INSTALLATION EMB-135 EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-2 21-20-04 Page 1 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 21-20-04-000-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 2. TYPICAL DUCT - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the instructions to remove a typical duct. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-02/100 - AMM MPP 06-41-04/100 - AMM TASK 21-20-01-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-23-01-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-23-02-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 53-01-01-000-801-A/400 COCKPIT FLOOR PANELS - REMOVAL AMM TASK 53-01-02-000-802-A/400 - SB145-21-0024 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the aircraft I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-014-A (1) Remove the cockpit floor panels as necessary (AMM MPP 06-41-02/100 and AMM TASK 53-01-01-000-801-A/400). (2) Remove the passenger-cabin floor panels as necessary (AMM MPP 06-41-02/100 and AMM TASK 53-01-02-000-802-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 CONFIG-2 21-20-04 Page 2 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Remove the passenger-cabin sidewall lining panels as necessary (AMM MPP 06-41-04/100 and AMM TASK 25-23-01-000-801-A/400). (4) Remove the passenger-cabin skirting lining panels as necessary (AMM MPP 06-41-04/100 and AMM TASK 25-23-02-000-801-A/400). (5) Remove the thermal insulating blankets as necessary (AMM TASK 21-20-01-000-801- A/400). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-014-A (1) Refer to DET. C and remove the duct as follows: (a) Remove and discard the tiedown strap(s) (4) that attach(es) the duct (1) to the support(s) (2). (b) Remove the clamp (3) (when applicable). (c) Remove the adhesive tape (5). (d) Remove the duct (1). (2) Refer to DET. B and remove the duct as follows: (a) Refer to DET. F and remove the adhesive tape (9). (b) Refer to DET. E and remove and discard the tiedown strap (6) that attaches the duct (8) to the support (7). (c) Remove the duct (8). (3) Refer to DET. D and remove the duct as follows: (a) Refer to DET. G and remove the screws (13) and washers (14) from the support (15). (b) Refer to VIEW H and remove the sealant from the junction areas of the ducts. (c) Refer to DET. E and remove and discard the tiedown strap (10) that attaches the duct (12) to the support (11). (d) On aircraft POST-MOD. SB145-21-0024, refer to DET. J and remove and discard the tiedown strap (18) that attaches the duct (17) to the duct (19). (e) Remove the duct (17). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 CONFIG-2 21-20-04 Page 3 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

WASHER 13. SCREW 16. DUCT 40 mm 40 mm 15. SUPPORT H VIEW H DET. G APPLY SEALANT RTV780. REFER TO SRM 51-20-01. 1 FOR ALTERNATIVE SEALANTS, REFER TO AMM 20-30-03/201. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 21-20-04-400-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 3. TYPICAL DUCT - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the instructions to install a typical duct. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION 21-21-00 or 21-22-00 or 21-23-00 - AMM MPP 06-41-02/100 - AMM MPP 06-41-04/100 - AMM TASK 21-20-01-400-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-23-01-400-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-23-02-400-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 53-01-01-400-801-A/400 COCKPIT FLOOR PANELS - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 53-01-02-400-802-A/400 - SB145-21-0024 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) KB 42/75 - 75 mm (2.95 in) Adhesive tape AR ASTM C-920 Sealant AR G. Expendable Parts IPC REFERENCE ITEM QTY (VENDOR REFERENCE) Cable Tiedown Strap 21-21-00 or 21-22-00 or 21-23-00 AR H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the aircraft EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 CONFIG-2 21-20-04 Page 7 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-013-A (1) Refer to DET. C and install the duct as follows: (a) Join the ducts (1). (b) Attach the joint with 5 turns of adhesive tape (5). (c) Install the clamp (3) (when applicable). (d) Install the new tiedown strap(s) (4) that attach(es) the duct (1) to the support(s) (2). (2) Refer to DET. B and install the duct as follows: (a) Join the ducts (8). (b) Refer to DET. E and install the new tiedown strap (6) that attaches the duct (8) to the support (7). (c) Refer to DET. F and attach the joint with 5 turns of adhesive tape (9). (3) Refer to DET. D and install the duct as follows: (a) Put the duct (12) in its installation position. (b) Refer to DET. G and install the screws (13) and washers (14) in the support (15). (c) On aircraft POST-MOD. SB145-21-0024, refer to DET. J and install the new tiedown strap (18) that attaches the duct (17) to the duct (19). (d) Refer to DET. E and install the new tiedown strap (6) that attaches the duct (8) to the support (7). (e) Refer to VIEW H to apply a bead of sealant at the junction area of the ducts. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-013-A (1) Install the thermal insulating blankets as necessary (AMM TASK 21-20-01-400-801-A/ 400). (2) Install the passenger-cabin skirting lining panels as necessary (AMM MPP 06-41-04/100 and AMM TASK 25-23-02-400-801-A/400). (3) Install the passenger-cabin sidewall lining panels as necessary (AMM MPP 06-41-04/100 and AMM TASK 25-23-01-400-801-A/400). (4) Install the passenger-cabin floor panels as necessary (AMM MPP 06-41-02/100 and AMM TASK 53-01-02-400-802-A/400). (5) Install the cockpit floor panels as necessary (AMM MPP 06-41-02/100 and AMM TASK 53-01-01-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 CONFIG-2 21-20-04 Page 8 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
